name: Mega Man Space 2
description:
Mega Man Space 2 is a Mega Man based fangame with a drastic change on the genre, tanking the blue bomber into an arcade-like space action adventure.

The evil Dr. Wily is making evil plans... Yet again. This time, he sent his robots into space. Dr. Light has renewed the Megaship so Mega Man can stop Dr. Wily and save the day one more time.
